name: A Small Dragon Kid Game
description:
This is a small game about a small dragon kid that jumps around collecting gold and video game treasures.

This was my first PICO-8 project (and "finished", published game).

How to play:

You control a small dragon kid. You can jump on slimes, and bounce off slime balloons. You can jump up — or off — walls.

If a slime knocks you out, or if you land on spikes, you will lose 5 gold. Gold is worth 1, and video game treasures/large gold bricks are worth 10. Try to collect as much gold and treasure as you can!

Best played with a controller!

Special thanks:

  • Krystman
  • Nerdy Teachers
  • ViNull
  • MBoffin

Though "complete", it isn't very long, and ends abruptly.  

My intention was to just mess around with PICO-8, but after watching Krystman (Lazy Devs) talk about the importance of finishing your first game (in this video), I felt compelled to get it in a finished state and put it out, before moving on to start something new.

I hope you enjoy the game, and pardon the bugs, code, art, and lack of background music! x)
